subject: Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Arkansas defensive end Marcus Harrison was suspended indefinitely after being arrested Friday night in Fayetteville on a felony drug charge and several misdemeanors. He was also charged with failure to appear for a court date in another case.Coach Houston Nutt said in a statement yesterday that Harrison, a 23-year-old senior, had violated team rules and would not play in the No. 21 Razorbacks’ season opener against Troy on Sept. 1.
